info.name: AvistaZ Network Dark 2.0 basic (alpha)
info.description: Dark style for AvistaZ Network 2.0 by barto
info.additionalInfo: 21.08.2017 Added missing coloring rule for "Download Incomplete" torrents. 17.05.2017 Removed radio and checkbox styling due to compatibility issues in Firefox. 15.05.2017 - Initial release Majority of the elements should by styled with dark color scheme.
